titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for an unlimited number of shareholders in an S corporation if all of the shareholders are members of the same family.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt S corporations from the limitation on the number of shareholders if all the shareholders are members of the same family.
